channel.title: Mute help
channel.description: hey i was wonderin if any one knew how to make the ::mute command in devo v7 work for 24 hours, as it is right now it only mutes until they log off, or maybe tell me how to make it mute until i del the name out of the mute file

item.title: Mute help
item.dc:creator: @Kollidierende Kolli`
item.description:
@Kollidierende wrote:

Do you have a mutes log though?

Read full topic

item.title: Mute help
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

nope i figured it out i add

if (checkLog("mutes", playerName)) { muted = true }

under

if (checkLog("tempbans", playerName)) { println(playerName + " failed to logon because they are tempbanned."); returnCode = 4; disconnected = true; return; }

Read full topic

item.title: Mute help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Do you want to ban them? If not, then no.

Read full topic

item.title: Mute help
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

what would i search for to add it?
lol

burnout ======= no0b[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2008, 09:35:08 PM[/size][hr]ok so i found what i was lookin for but heres what im changing (changing the copy not the origional)

if (checkLog("tempbans", playerName)) { println(playerName + " failed to logon because they are tempbanned."); returnCode = 4; disconnected = true; return; }

would i change it to this?

if (checkLog("mutes", playerName)) { returnCode = 4; disconnected = false; return; }

Read full topic

item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

make it load the log file when they login
